name: CreateGcpCostManagementAccount
description:
Create a cost management account for Google Cloud usage.

This tool creates a Cloud Cost Management account specifically for Google Cloud Usage Cost configurations. It should be called when a user wants to set up or initiate tracking and managing costs related to their Google Cloud resources.

parameters.name: usage_cost_config_type
parameters.description: Specifies the type of Google Cloud Usage Cost configuration post request. Use "gcp_uc_config_post_request" to indicate this type.

value_schema.description: Type of Google Cloud Usage Cost config post request.

parameters.name: google_cloud_billing_account_id
parameters.description: The Google Cloud account ID for cost management.

parameters.name: gcp_bucket_name
parameters.description: The name of the Google Cloud bucket where the Usage Cost exports are stored.

value_schema.description: The Google Cloud bucket name used to store the Usage Cost export.

parameters.name: gcp_usage_cost_export_dataset_name
parameters.description: The dataset name used for exporting the Google Cloud Usage Cost report.

value_schema.description: The export dataset name used for the Google Cloud Usage Cost report.

parameters.name: google_cloud_export_prefix
parameters.description: The export prefix for the Google Cloud Usage Cost report.

value_schema.description: The export prefix used for the Google Cloud Usage Cost report.

parameters.name: gcp_usage_cost_report_name
parameters.description: The name of the Google Cloud Usage Cost report to be used for cost management.

value_schema.description: The name of the Google Cloud Usage Cost report.

parameters.name: google_cloud_service_account_email
parameters.description: The unique Google Cloud service account email required for the cost management setup.

value_schema.description: The unique Google Cloud service account email.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.description: The export prefix used for the Google Cloud Usage Cost report.

value_schema.description: The export prefix used for the Google Cloud Usage Cost report.

parameters.name: data.attributes.export_project_name
parameters.description: The name of the Google Cloud Usage Cost report.

value_schema.description: The name of the Google Cloud Usage Cost report.

parameters.description: The unique Google Cloud service account email.

value_schema.description: The unique Google Cloud service account email.

value_schema.description: Type of Google Cloud Usage Cost config post request.
